alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 3:40AM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills of 25 below to 40 below zero. * WHERE...Bennington and western Windham Counties in southern Vermont, Hamilton, Herkimer, Schoharie, and western Greene Counties in eastern New York, and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
